page.title: 04ENTERTAINMENT IN BOREHAMWOOD
page.content: Borehamwood is a large town, sorely lacking good recreational facilities. {Sport}is fairly well catered for but general entertainment is not. There used to be a cinema but this has now been demolished.{Films}are shown in the{Civic Hall,}a multi-purpose venue also used for shows, dances etc. While the shows are of a good standard one building cannot serve the whole town. Children and teenagers do have the occasional{disco,}although some of these have ceased to operate. There is a general feeling that without entertainment offered by schools and other organisations there would be nothing. There is little wonder that {boredom}exists and therefore{vandalism occurs. Adults have{public houses}as their major 'social' centre. However, with transport, they can travel to nearby towns for better facilities.
